channel.title: Little XP Thing
channel.description:
I was wondering how to get xp [b][i]while[/i][/b] attacking an npc/player. I know how to get xp [b][i]after[/i][/b] killing an npc/player, but thats not a good way in my opinion :/
So what do i do?

item.description:

Yea noticed that

item.title: Little XP Thing
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[quote=“Teeez, post:13, topic:143923”]I mean like

					if (FightType != # && npcs[NPCID].npcType == #) {

if i use the

npcs[NPCID.npcType == #)

Wouldnt that make it so you only get xp on slayer monsters? like not even strength or anything on the others?[/quote]
Then do this

if (FightType != # && npcs[NPCID].npcType == #) { TotalExp = (double)(800* hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else if(FightType != #) { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if(FightType != #) { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); }

Read full topic

if i use the

Wouldnt that make it so you only get xp on slayer monsters? like not even strength or anything on the others?

item.title: Little XP Thing
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

I’m thinking it would be something along these lines…

if (FightType != # && npcs[NPCID].npcType == #) { TotalExp = (double)(800* hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); }
Of course, that’s just a sketch.

Read full topic

item.title: Little XP Thing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

so somewhere under

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(800* hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); }

I can add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18); client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; }

or where to add it ? -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Little XP Thing
item.dc:creator: @JavaJunky JavaJunky
item.description:
@JavaJunky wrote:

You could have to make the experience be added before attacking the npc.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18); client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; }

Read full topic

item.title: Little XP Thing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well yeah your right about that, but i mean your gonna get slayer xp for just those specific npcs the same way.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 11:51:42 AM[/size][hr]Heres the code for xp when you killed an npc…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18); }

So how do i make this into auto xp when you attack an npc but with slayer aswell?

Read full topic
